JWT Endpoints¶

JWT Create¶

Use this endpoint to obtain JWT.

Default URL: /jwt/create/

Method

Request

Response

POST

  • {{ User.USERNAME_FIELD }}

  • password

HTTP_200_OK

  • access

  • refresh

HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED

  • non_field_errors

JWT Refresh¶

Use this endpoint to refresh JWT.

Default URL: /jwt/refresh/

Method

Request

Response

POST

  • refresh

HTTP_200_OK

  • access

HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED

  • non_field_errors

JWT Verify¶

Use this endpoint to verify JWT.

Default URL: /jwt/verify/

Method

Request

Response

POST

  • token

HTTP_200_OK

HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED

  • non_field_errors
